location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:85 x 141 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn sketch map of the Persian Gulf region produced to illustrate the album of the photographs taken by Edwin Aubrey Storrs-Fox showing places visited during the tour of 1916-1918.Inscriptions:Upper centre, above image, in black ink: ‘The Persian Gulf’ and ‘1916-1918’.
